description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The fastest turtle in the world is back for more zany 8-bit arcade action in 3 all new levels!  Join him and his new pal Pirate Turtle as they race to a banging chiptune soundtrack composed by Octapus!  This companion to the original game can also be enjoyed as a standalone title.
